settings.heading: Apply to be a Lontreau Brand Ambassador
settings.content:
We're looking for individuals passionate about optimizing skin and overall health.
APPLICATIONS ARE NOW OPEN

settings.heading: The partnership
settings.content: As a member of the Lontreau Ambassador Team, your role will be to help promote Lontreau to your community.

settings.heading: Ambassador duties
settings.content:
We request the following from each ambassador:
  • FOLLOW LONTREAU ON SOCIALS
  • PROVIDE LONTREAU WITH YOUR CHOICE OF 1 VIDEO OR 3 IMAGES WITH OUR BRAND IN IT EVERY 3 MONTHS (PER TERM)
  • CREATE LONTREAU CONTENT ON YOUR PERSONAL SOCIAL ACCOUNTS ORGANICALLY
  • ENGAGE WITH LONTREAU'S CONTENT (IE. LIKING, COMMENTING. REPOSTING, ETC. IN A NATURAL WAY)
  • SHARE YOUR UNIQUE DISCOUNT CODE WITH YOUR COMMUNITY

settings.heading: Ambassador perles
settings.content:
We provide our ambassadors with the following:
  • ONE FREE CORE KIT PER TERM (3 MONTHS)
  • 10% COMMISSION ON SALES USING YOUR UNIQUE CODE
  • FIRST ACCESS TO PRODUCT LAUNCHES
